languages.text: "Вольные Торговцы славятся любовью к эпатажу и махинациям. Быть может, вы и правда безумны".
"Rogue Traders are famed for their love of outlandish exploits and skullduggery. Perhaps you really are insane."
languages.original_text: "Вольные Торговцы славятся любовью к эпатажу и махинациям. Быть может, вы и правда безумны".

traits.locale_text: "Rogue Traders are famed for their love of outlandish exploits and skullduggery. Perhaps you really are insane."

languages.text: "Freihändler sind für ihre Begeisterung für absonderliche Taten und Betrügereien bekannt. Vielleicht seid Ihr ja wirklich verrückt."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are famed for their love of outlandish exploits and skullduggery. Perhaps you really are insane."

traits.locale_text: "Freihändler sind für ihre Begeisterung für absonderliche Taten und Betrügereien bekannt. Vielleicht seid Ihr ja wirklich verrückt."

languages.text: « Les libres-marchands sont connus pour leur goût des exploits extravagants et des manœuvres sournoises. Peut-être avez-vous vraiment perdu la raison... »
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are famed for their love of outlandish exploits and skullduggery. Perhaps you really are insane."

traits.locale_text: « Les libres-marchands sont connus pour leur goût des exploits extravagants et des manœuvres sournoises. Peut-être avez-vous vraiment perdu la raison... »

languages.text: “行商浪人热衷于不合常理的阴谋诡计，这一点众所周知。或许你确实就是疯了。”
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are famed for their love of outlandish exploits and skullduggery. Perhaps you really are insane."

traits.locale_text: “行商浪人热衷于不合常理的阴谋诡计，这一点众所周知。或许你确实就是疯了。”

languages.text: «Los Comerciantes Independientes son famosos por su amor por las hazañas excéntricas y los embustes. Es posible que esté loc{mf|o|a}».
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are famed for their love of outlandish exploits and skullduggery. Perhaps you really are insane."

traits.locale_text: «Los Comerciantes Independientes son famosos por su amor por las hazañas excéntricas y los embustes. Es posible que esté loc{mf|o|a}».

languages.text: 「ローグトレーダーは奇抜な冒険や陰謀を好むことで有名です。もしかすると、本当に正気じゃないのかもしれませんな」
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are famed for their love of outlandish exploits and skullduggery. Perhaps you really are insane."

traits.locale_text: 「ローグトレーダーは奇抜な冒険や陰謀を好むことで有名です。もしかすると、本当に正気じゃないのかもしれませんな」

languages.text: "Hür tacirler, olağan dışı sömürüleriyle ve hilekârlıklarıyla ünlüdür. Belki de aklın sahiden yerinde değildir."
languages.original_text: "Rogue Traders are famed for their love of outlandish exploits and skullduggery. Perhaps you really are insane."

traits.locale_text: "Hür tacirler, olağan dışı sömürüleri ve hilekârlıklarıyla ünlüdür. Belki de aklın sahiden yerinde değildir."
